method.text: Boil the potatoes whole and unpeeled in a large pan of boiling water for 8-10 min or until just cooked. Drain off all excess water.
Peel off the skins. Puree flesh in a food processor or rub through a sieve until smooth.
Gradually knead the flour into the potatoes, 25 g at a time. The mixture should be soft and smooth and only slightly sticky.
Dust the work surface and your hands with flour. Roll the mix into sausage shapes. Cut in 2 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> cm thick slices. Roll into balls.
Cook the Gnocchi in batches in a large pan of boiling water for about 10-12 sec.
Drain thoroughly and keep warm. Repeat with the remainder. Serve immediately.
